ExploreFact.Text: A mostly buried structure on the equator of Daucus. A Nomai named Adonsonia theorized about whether the sand could be moved elsewhere.
By siphoning the sand off the planet using the largest planet in the system, I was able to access the rest of the structure.
A structure built around a warp receiver on the equator of Daucus. A Nomai named Adonsonia neglected to include a door.
I was able to access the rest of the structure by arriving via the warp transmitter.
